attributes.action: Stop the building of a School in Charlestown, Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The building of a new school on Victoria Avenue East Manchester will destroy peoples privacy, destroy trees and wildlife and also create noise problems.
The city council has not provided suitable planning or discussed it with residents, they are going ahead with the build and no restident has been consulted or shown plans. This is not acceptable and this petition is created to stop the building of the school and get the council to rethink their plans and rebuild elsewhere.
